content: this year s little mystery pattern was extracted from one of my first patterns butterfly 40 /patterns/library/butterfly-40-2 learn more about ashlee s mystery designs at https //ashleeslint com/2023/11/07/october-mystery-patterns/ 1 there are **two files included** in this listing - interlocking crochet fully written pattern and chart - overlay mosaic crochet fully written pattern and x-marked chart ***important details*** **interlocking crochet** chart is 41 x 41 finished size 10 / 26cm 4 5 mm hook us7 worsted weight yarn 200 - 225 yards total o main color mc dark lines 100 yards plus 25 yards for optional border o accent color ac background 100 yards gauge 8 double_crochet chain x 8 row = 4 **overlay mosaic crochet** chart is 37 x 37 size without fringe or border 10 5 x 10 / 27cm x 25cm 5 mm hook h-8 worsted weight yarn 130 230 yards total o main color dark lines 50 yards o contrasting color background 80 yards o optional envelope border 100 yards gauge 14 stitches x 15 row = 4 ____ **techniques** the locked filet mesh lfm interlocking crochet method uses only chain spaces and double crochets to create a mesh two colors are worked alternately which creates the pattern mosaic crochet is single_crochet and double_crochet stitches the double_crochet stitches cover some of the other color s single_crochet stitches to create the design my patterns instruct you to cut your yarn at the end of each row the back is striped but often gives a faint impression of the pattern on the front sort of like illusion knitting ____ i have youtube tutorials available for both crochet methods follow this link to get to my youtube channel and find my other social links https //ashleeslint com/link-in-bio 2 _____ **testers** thank you to my testers cyncitycrochet deahanna hernandez lieb erin carlson eva henriette van wyck kim b marie sparks nancy mckain sonjia schultz and teresa ©️ ashlee brotzell 2025 all rights reserved this publication is protected under federal copyright laws reproduction or distribution in whole or in part in any medium is strictly prohibited what does this mean this is an original pattern by ashlee brotzell you may not copy reproduce sell or share any part of it whether for profit or not this includes but is not limited to the written pattern the chart and the photos no translations or video tutorials are allowed sales of your finished items are of course unrestricted and i wish you all the best i appreciate credit given to the designer when possible but it is not a requirement you may tag me @ashleeslint or direct people to my website www ashleeslint com 3 1 https //ashleeslint com/2023/11/07/october-mystery-patterns/ 2 https //ashleeslint com/link-in-bio/ 3 https //ashleeslint com/
